text:
e="preserve">Maurice Bidermann, real name Maurice Zylberberg, (4 April 1932 – 30 March 2020) was a Belgian-born French businessman. His company worked in the textile sector. He was a Knight of the French National Order of Merit in 1991. Bidermann was born in Anderlecht, Belgium. Bidermann was sentenced to three years in prison, two suspended, and fined one million euros.
Bidermann died on 30 March 2020 of COVID-19 in Paris.
